change.item: This finding aid was updated in alignment with LC EAD 2.0 specifications using a python script created by Erik Radio.

did.head: Collection Summary
did.abstract: One leather-bound volume with 48 pages of printed crests mounted onto hand-painted geometric, floral, and military designs. Themes of the crests include royalty, military regiments, girls' names, animals, insects, shields, Latin mottos, castles, initials, and identified English clubs, hotels, museums, and colleges.

repository.label: Repository
repository.corpname: University of Arizona Libraries, Special Collections

accessrestrict.head: Restrictions
accessrestrict.p: There are no restrictions on this collection.

prefercite.head: Credit Line
prefercite.p: Crests (MS 262). Special Collections, University of Arizona Libraries.

bioghist.head: Biographical Note
bioghist.p: The full-page introductory monogram, combined with a prominent one later, suggest that this album is the work of, or belonged to, one A.C. Johnson.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: This collection is organized by theme.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Note
scopecontent.p: One leather-bound volume with 48 pages of printed crests mounted onto hand-painted geometric, floral, and military designs. Themes of the crests include royalty, military regiments, girls' names, animals, insects, shields, Latin mottos, castles, initials, and identified English clubs, hotels, museums, and colleges.
The overall appearance suggests a production date in the late 19th century or early 20th century, but no specific date can be given.
